attributes.additional_details: Mugabe style democracy where if you disagree with a majority vote you protest and get it turned over is the road to Dictatorship! Our Vote was More democratic than FPTP. A true majority.
attributes.background: #wearethe17million Liberal Dems (Wearethe48) and Remain are organising anti Democratic protests to overturn the Brexit vote we need to protect democracy! 17.3 million (More than a 1 Million majority) 52% voted Brexit! That vote needs to be accepted!
